column5: Well went out for another day of lake trout,fishing was decent but coulnt locate big schools of lakers,they seem to be spreading out,they come by but a lot of single fish,yesterdays spot was totally flooded out,went to a new spot ,there was hardly any snow therr as ccomparrd to some of the other places we have been,the ice was thicker also,we are finding different ice thickness everywhere,but going from spots to spot there are areas full of slush,so be carefull,there are some huge air holes also,fish are still being caught from 40' to 70',when fishing the deeper holes we srr catching whitefish with the odd laker.
